channel.title: Posts on Kathryn Morrison, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kathryn Morrison, PhD

item.title: The new markdown syntax is awesome
item.description: I love how it automatically shows the compiled latex from math mode! Makes it a lot easier to read and avoid mistakes that take a long time to debug.

item.title: Tracking my spending with Mint.com and R
WHO air pollution model
item.description: One of my supervisors (Gavin Shaddick, University of Bath) has been working with his students and the WHO to estimate air pollution globally - the interactive data product went out yesterday and has been getting a lot of press. Very cool! WHO Report Guardian article Science Daily article NPR NYTimes
